In a message dated 2/16/03 12:14:15 AM Central Standard Time, 
airly2002@... writes:


> Hydras laughted "Well you're cunning, more cunning than most of 
> Preds here, Maxima... What questions needs answers?"
> 

"Hmm..." she pondered that question. "Some of those answers to my questions 
come from observing. & at this point, you are my case subject."

"Yet you are the fusion of Megatron & Galvatron.. surely you are someone who 
is completely different with some past connections. & memories." She paced as 
she thought. What could she do to make him open up, to have him trust her 
more so, that he would just vent.. talk... tell her anything. It was that way 
that she could understand & learn more about anyone or anything. 

"Tell me of your... stance. Your opinion on the Autobots, these Maximals, .. 
even the Tripreds whom it was my understanding that you had an alliance with 
them. Or even, what of your own troops? These so called Predacons?" She 
stopped & looked at him. "What about the idea of being a real Decepticon? Let 
alone having a real Decepticon as one of your own." 

She smirked, her clear blue eyes watching for his reaction. Watching him 
carefully. 

--part1_149.aa40f6b.2b808deb_boundary
